StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markcard_param
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE proc_markcard_param ( p_school_code IN VARCHAR2, p_class_code IN VARCHAR2, p_stream_code IN VARCHAR2, p_term_code IN VARCHAR2, p_parameter_name IN OUT VARCHAR2 ) IS
---cursor on parameter_name CURSOR cur_parameter_name ( pp_school_code VARCHAR2, pp_class_code VARCHAR2, pp_stream_code VARCHAR2, pp_term_code VARCHAR2, pp_parameter_name VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT pseudo_name FROM ( SELECT school_code, batch_no#, class_code, stream_code, term_code, parameter_name, pseudo_name, status_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY school_code, class_code, stream_code, term_code, parameter_name ORDER BY batch_no# DESC ) AS my_rank FROM school_rep_temp WHERE school_code = pp_school_code AND class_code = pp_class_code AND stream_code = pp_stream_code AND term_code = pp_term_code AND parameter_name = pp_parameter_name ) WHERE my_rank = 1 AND status_type = 'Y'; BEGIN OPEN cur_parameter_name(pp_school_code => p_school_code, pp_class_code => p_class_code, pp_stream_code => p_stream_code, pp_term_code => p_term_code, pp_parameter_name => p_parameter_name); FETCH cur_parameter_name INTO p_parameter_name; CLOSE cur_parameter_name; END;
